00075         public function process() {
00076 
00077 
00078                 $this->init();
00079 
00080                 //send emails
00081                 $this->sendMail('admin');
00082                 $this->sendMail('user');
00083 
00084                 return $this->gp;
00085         }

00094         protected function parseTemplate($mode,$suffix) {
00095                 $view = $this->componentManager->getComponent('F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Mail');
00096                 $view->setLangFile($this->langFile);
00097                 $view->setPredefined($this->predefined);
00098                 
00099                 $templateCode = $this->getTemplate();
00100                 $view->setTemplate($templateCode, 'EMAIL_'.strtoupper($mode).'_'.strtoupper($suffix));
00101                 if(!$view->hasTemplate()) {
00102                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('no_mail_template',$mode,$suffix);
00103                 }
00104                 
00105 
00106                 
00107                 /*$markers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getFilledLangMarkers($template,$this->langFile);
00108                 $valueMarkers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getFilledValueMarkers($this->gp);
00109                 $markers = array_merge($valueMarkers,$markers);
00110                 $this->sanitizeMarkers($markers);
00111                 $template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($template, $markers);
00112                 $template = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::removeUnfilledMarkers($template);*/
00113                 return $view->render($this->gp,array());
00114         }

00122         protected function sanitizeMarkers(&$markers) {
00123                 $checkBinaryCrLf = $this->settings['checkBinaryCrLf'];
00124                 if ($checkBinaryCrLf != '') {
00125                         $markersToCheck = t3lib_div::trimExplode(',',$checkBinaryCrLf);
00126                         foreach($markersToCheck as $idx=>$val) {
00127                                 if(substr($val,0,3) != '###') {
00128                                         $val = '###'.$markersToCheck[$idx];
00129                                 }
00130 
00131                                 if(substr($val,-3) != '###') {
00132                                         $val .= '###';
00133                                 }
00134                                 $iStr = $markers[$val];
00135                                 $iStr = str_replace (chr(13),'<br />', $iStr);
00136                                 $iStr = str_replace ('\\','', $iStr);
00137                                 $markers[$val] = $iStr;
00138 
00139                         }
00140                 }
00141                 foreach($markers as $field=>&$value) {
00142                         $value = nl2br($value);
00143                 }
00144         }
00145 
00153         protected function getTemplate() {
00154                 $templateFile = $this->settings['templateFile'];
00155                 if(isset($this->settings['templateFile.']) && is_array($this->settings['templateFile.'])) {
00156                         $templateFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($this->settings['templateFile'],$this->settings['templateFile.']);
00157                 } else {
00158                         $templateFile = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($templateFile);
00159                 }
00160                 $template = t3lib_div::getURL($templateFile);
00161                 
00162                 return $template;
00163         }

00171         protected function sendMail($type) {
00172                 if($this->settings[$type]['disable'] == '1') {
00173                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_disabled',$type);
00174                         return;
00175                 } 
00176                 
00177                 $mailSettings = $this->settings[$type];
00178                 $template['plain'] = $this->parseTemplate($type,"plain");
00179                 $template['html'] = $this->parseTemplate($type,"html");
00180                 //F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('E-Mail settings for '.$type);
00181                 //F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugArray($mailSettings);
00182 
00183                 //init mailer object
00184                 require_once(PATH_t3lib.'class.t3lib_htmlmail.php');
00185                 $emailObj = t3lib_div::makeInstance('t3lib_htmlmail');
00186                 $emailObj->start();
00187 
00188                 //set e-mail options
00189                 $emailObj->subject = $mailSettings['subject'];
00190 
00191                 $sender = $mailSettings['sender_email'];
00192                 if(isset($mailSettings['sender_email']) && is_array($mailSettings['sender_email'])) {
00193                         $sender = implode(",",$mailSettings['sender_email']);
00194                 }
00195                 $emailObj->from_email = $sender;
00196                 $emailObj->from_name = $mailSettings['sender_name'];
00197 
00198                 $replyto = $mailSettings['replyto_email'];
00199                 if(isset($mailSettings['replyto_email']) && is_array($mailSettings['replyto_email'])) {
00200                         $replyto = implode(",",$mailSettings['replyto_email']);
00201                 }
00202                 $emailObj->replyto_email = $replyto;
00203                 $emailObj->replyto_name = $mailSettings['replyto_name'];
00204                 $emailObj->returnPath = '';
00205                 if($mailSettings['email_header']) {
00206                         $emailObj->add_header($mailSettings['header']);
00207                 }
00208                 if($template['plain']) {
00209                         $emailObj->setPlain($template['plain']);
00210                 }
00211 
00212                 if($template['html']) {
00213                         if($mailSettings['htmlEmailAsAttachment']) {
00214                                 $prefix = 'mailformplusplus_';
00215                                 if(isset($emailSettings['filePrefix.']['html'])) {
00216                                         $prefix = $emailSettings['filePrefix.']['html'];
00217                                 } elseif(isset($emailSettings['filePrefix'])) {
00218                                         $prefix = $emailSettings['filePrefix'];
00219                                 }
00220                                 $tmphtml = tempnam('typo3temp/','/'.$prefix).'.html';
00221                                 $tmphtml = str_replace('.tmp','',$tmphtml);
00222                                 $tmphandle = fopen($tmphtml,"wb");
00223                                 if ($tmphandle) {
00224                                         fwrite($tmphandle,$template['html']);
00225                                         fclose($tmphandle);
00226                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('Adding HTML: '.$tmphtml);
00227                                         $emailObj->addAttachment($tmphtml);
00228                                 }
00229                         } else {
00230                                 $emailObj->setHtml($template['html']);
00231                         }
00232                 }
00233 
00234                 if(!is_array($mailSettings['attachment'])) {
00235                         $mailSettings['attachment'] = array($mailSettings['attachment']);
00236                 }
00237                 foreach($mailSettings['attachment'] as $attachment) {
00238                         if(strlen($attachment) > 0) {
00239                                 $emailObj->addAttachment($attachment);
00240                         }
00241                 }
00242                 if($mailSettings['attachPDF']) {
00243                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('Adding PDF: '.$mailSettings['attachPDF']);
00244                         $emailObj->addAttachment($mailSettings['attachPDF']);
00245                 }
00246 
00247                 //parse max count of mails to send
00248                 $count = 0;
00249                 $max = $this->settings['limitMailsToUser'];
00250                 if(!$max) {
00251                         $max = 2;
00252                 }
00253                 if(!is_array($mailSettings['to_email'])) {
00254                         $mailSettings['to_email'] = array($mailSettings['to_email']);
00255                 }
00256                 reset($mailSettings['to_email']);
00257 
00258                 
00259 
00260                 //send e-mails
00261                 foreach($mailSettings['to_email'] as $mailto) {
00262 
00263                         if($count < $max) {
00264                                 if (strstr($mailto, '@') && !eregi("\r",$mailto) && !eregi("\n",$mailto)) {
00265                                         $sent = $emailObj->send($mailto);
00266                                 }
00267                                 $count++;
00268                         }
00269                         if($sent) {
00270                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_sent',$mailto);
00271                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_subject',$emailObj->subject);
00272                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_sender',$emailObj->from_name." <".$emailObj->from_email.">",false);
00273                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_replyto',$emailObj->replyto_name." <".$emailObj->replyto_email.">",false);
00274                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_plain',$template['plain'],false);
00275                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_html',$template['html'],false);
00276                         } else {
00277                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_not_sent',$mailto);
00278                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_subject',$emailObj->subject);
00279                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_sender',$emailObj->from_name." <".$emailObj->from_email.">",false);
00280                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_replyto',$emailObj->replyto_name." <".$emailObj->replyto_email.">",false);
00281                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_plain',$template['plain'],false);
00282                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_html',$template['html'],false);
00283                         }
00284                 }
00285                 if($tmphtml) {
00286                         unlink($tmphtml);
00287                 }
00288         }

00297         private function explodeList($list,$sep = ",") {
00298                 $items = t3lib_div::trimExplode($sep,$list);
00299                 $splitArray = array();
00300                 foreach($items as $item) {
00301                         if(isset($this->gp[$item])) {
00302                                 array_push($splitArray,$this->gp[$item]);
00303                         } else {
00304                                 array_push($splitArray,$item);
00305                         }
00306                 }
00307                 return $splitArray;
00308         }
00309 
00316         private function parseSettingValue($value) {
00317                 if(isset($this->gp[$value])) {
00318                         $parsed = $this->gp[$value];
00319                 } else {
00320                         $parsed = $value;
00321                 }
00322                 return $parsed;
00323 
00324         }
00325 
00335         private function parseValue($settings,$type,$key) {
00336                 if(isset($this->emailSettings[$type][$key])) {
00337                         $parsed = $this->parseSettingValue($this->emailSettings[$type][$key]);
00338                 } else if(isset($settings[$key.'.']) && is_array($settings[$key.'.'])) {
00339                         $parsed = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings[$key],$settings[$key.'.']);
00340                 } else {
00341                         $parsed = $this->parseSettingValue($settings[$key]);
00342                 }
00343                 return $parsed;
00344         }
00345 
00355         private function parseList($settings,$type,$key) {
00356                 if(isset($this->emailSettings[$type][$key])) {
00357                         $parsed = $this->explodeList($this->emailSettings[$type][$key]);
00358                 } else if(isset($settings[$key.'.']) && is_array($settings[$key.'.'])) {
00359                         $parsed = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings[$key],$settings[$key.'.']);
00360                 } else {
00361                         $parsed = $this->explodeList($settings[$key]);
00362                 }
00363                 return $parsed;
00364         }
00365 
00374         private function parseFilesList($settings,$type,$key) {
00375                 if(isset($settings[$key.'.']) && is_array($settings[$key.'.'])) {
00376                         $parsed = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings[$key],$settings[$key.'.']);
00377                 } elseif($settings[$key]) {
00378                         $files = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings[$key]);
00379                         $parsed = array();
00380                         session_start();
00381                         foreach($files as $file) {
00382                                 #print $file.":";
00383                                 #print_r($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles']);
00384                                 if(isset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$file])) {
00385                                         foreach($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$file] as $uploadedFile) {
00386                                                 array_push($parsed,$uploadedFile['uploaded_path'].$uploadedFile['uploaded_name']);
00387                                         }
00388                                 } else {
00389                                         array_push($parsed,$file);
00390                                 }
00391                         }
00392                 }
00393                 return $parsed;
00394         }

00402         protected function fillLangMarkersInSettings(&$settings) {
00403                 foreach($settings as &$value) {
00404                         if(isset($value) && is_array($value)) {
00405                                 $this->fillLangMarkersInSettings($value);
00406                         } else {
00407                                 $langMarkers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getFilledLangMarkers($value,$this->langFile);
00408                                 if(!empty($langMarkers)) {
00409                                         $value = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($value, $langMarkers);
00410                                 }
00411                         }
00412                 }
00413         }

00421                 return $this->configuration->getSettings();

00429         protected function init() {
00430 
00431                 //set language file
00432                 if(isset($this->settings['langFile.']) && is_array($this->settings['langFile.'])) {
00433                         $this->langFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($this->settings['langFile'],$this->settings['langFile.']);
00434                 } else {
00435                         $this->langFile = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($this->settings['langFile']);
00436                 }
00437         }

00446         public function loadConfig($gp,$tsConfig) {
00447                 $this->gp = $gp;
00448                 $this->settings = $tsConfig;
00449                 $this->init();
00450                 $this->settings = $this->parseEmailSettings($tsConfig);
00451 
00452                 // Defines default values
00453                 $defaultOptions = array(
00454                         'templateFile' => 'template_file',
00455                         'langFile' => 'lang_file',
00456                 );
00457                 foreach ($defaultOptions as $key => $option) {
00458                         $_fileName = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'],$option);
00459                         if ($_fileName !== '') {
00460                                 $this->settings[$key] = $_fileName;
00461                         }
00462                 }
00463 
00464                 // Unset unecessary variables.
00465                 unset($this->settings['admin.']);
00466                 unset($this->settings['user.']);
00467         }
00468 
00473         public function validateConfig() {
00474                 if ($this->settings['templateFile'] == '') {
00475                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::throwException('no_template');
00476                 }
00477         }

00485         protected function parseEmailSettings($tsConfig) {
00486                 $emailSettings = $tsConfig;
00487                 $options = array (
00488                         'filePrefix',
00489                         'to_email',
00490                         'subject',
00491                         'sender_email',
00492                         'sender_name',
00493                         'replyto_email',
00494                         'replyto_name',
00495                         'to_name',
00496                         'attachment',
00497                         'attachPDF',
00498                         'htmlEmailAsAttachment'
00499                         
00500                         );
00501 
00502                         //*************************
00503                         //ADMIN settings
00504                         //*************************
00505                         $emailSettings['admin'] = $this->parseEmailSettingsByType($emailSettings['admin.'],'admin',$options);
00506 
00507                         //*************************
00508                         //USER settings
00509                         //*************************
00510                         $emailSettings['user'] = $this->parseEmailSettingsByType($emailSettings['user.'],'user',$options);
00511 
00512                         return $emailSettings;
00513         }
00514 
00523         private function parseEmailSettingsByType($currentSettings,$type,$optionsToParse = array()) {
00524                 $typeLower = strtolower($type);
00525                 $typeUpper = strtoupper($type);
00526                 $section = 'sEMAIL'.$typeUpper;
00527                 $emailSettings = $currentSettings;
00528                 foreach($optionsToParse as $option) {
00529                         $value = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'],$option,$section);
00530                         if(strlen($value) > 0) {
00531                                 $emailSettings[$option] = $value;
00532                                 if(isset($this->gp[$value])) {
00533                                         $emailSettings[$option] = $this->gp[$value];
00534                                 }
00535 
00536                         } else {
00537                                 switch($option) {
00538                                         case "to_email":
00539                                         case "to_name":
00540                                         case "sender_email":
00541                                         case "replyto_email":
00542                                                 $emailSettings[$option] = $this->parseList($currentSettings,$type,$option);
00543                                                 break;
00544 
00545                                         case "subject":
00546                                         case "sender_name":
00547                                         case "replyto_name":
00548                                                 $emailSettings[$option] = $this->parseValue($currentSettings,$type,$option);
00549                                                 break;
00550 
00551                                         case "attachment":
00552                                                 $emailSettings[$option] = $this->parseFilesList($currentSettings,$type,$option);
00553                                                 break;
00554 
00555                                         case "attachPDF":
00556                                                 if(isset($currentSettings['attachPDF.']) && is_array($currentSettings['attachPDF.'])) {
00557                                                         #print "call";
00558                                                         $generatorClass = $currentSettings['attachPDF.']['class'];
00559                                                         if(!$generatorClass) {
00560                                                                 $generatorClass = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_PDF";
00561                                                         }
00562                                                         $generatorClass = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($generatorClass);
00563                                                         $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent($generatorClass);
00564                                                         $exportFields = array();
00565                                                         if($emailSettings['attachPDF.']['exportFields']) {
00566                                                                 $exportFields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$currentSettings['attachPDF.']['exportFields']);
00567                                                         }
00568                                                         #print_r($exportFields);
00569                                                         $prefix = 'mailformplusplus_';
00570                                                         if(isset($emailSettings['filePrefix.']['pdf'])) {
00571                                                                 $prefix = $emailSettings['filePrefix.']['pdf'];
00572                                                         } elseif(isset($emailSettings['filePrefix'])) {
00573                                                                 $prefix = $emailSettings['filePrefix'];
00574                                                         }
00575                                                         $file = tempnam('typo3temp/','/'.$prefix).'.pdf';
00576                                                         $file = str_replace('.tmp','',$file);
00577                                                         $generator->setTemplateCode($this->getTemplate());
00578                                                         $generator->generateFrontendPDF($this->gp,$this->langFile,$exportFields,$file,true);
00579                                                         $emailSettings['attachPDF'] = $file;
00580                                                 } elseif ($currentSettings['attachPDF']) {
00581                                                         $emailSettings['attachPDF'] = $currentSettings['attachPDF'];
00582                                                 }
00583                                                 break;
00584 
00585                                         case "htmlEmailAsAttachment":
00586                                                 if(isset($currentSettings['htmlEmailAsAttachment']) && !strcmp($currentSettings['htmlEmailAsAttachment'],"1")) {
00587                                                         $emailSettings['htmlEmailAsAttachment'] = 1;
00588                                                 }
00589 
00590                                                 break;
00591                                         case "filePrefix":
00592                                                 if(isset($currentSettings['filePrefix'])) {
00593                                                         $emailSettings['filePrefix'] = $currentSettings['filePrefix'];
00594                                                 }
00595                                         break;
00596                                 }
00597                         }
00598                 }
00599                 $this->fillLangMarkersInSettings($emailSettings);
00600                 return $emailSettings;
00601         }
